Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "The internal NPC manipulation command. This command is deprecated and should only be used on games using the old NPC system (non-NIP)."

"+npc scrolls\\r\\n List all scrolls enqueued in the system.\\r\\n\\r\\n+npc scrolls-from\\r\\n List scrolls sorted by sender.\\r\\n\\r\\n+npc scrolls-to\\r\\n List scrolls sorted by recipient.\\r\\n\\r\\n+npc courierbarrel10 start\\r\\n Start a new NPC from the \\"courierbarrel\\" set up with the ID \\"10\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+npc courierbarrel10 stop\\r\\n Stop the started \\"courierbarrel10\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n(There are several more commands, but as the command is to be replaced, effort was invested elsewhere.)"
